description: Lists the tags for the specified Firehose stream. This operation has a limit of five transactions per second per account.

parameters.name: DeliveryStreamName
parameters.description: The name of the Firehose stream whose tags you want to list.

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: A list of tags associated with DeliveryStreamName, starting with the first tag after ExclusiveStartTagKey and up to the specified Limit.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: A unique identifier for the tag. Maximum length: 128 characters. Valid characters: Unicode letters, digits, white space, _ . / = + - % @

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: An optional string, which you can use to describe or define the tag. Maximum length: 256 characters. Valid characters: Unicode letters, digits, white space, _ . / = + - % @

nested_items.name: HasMoreTags
nested_items.description: If this is true in the response, more tags are available. To list the remaining tags, set ExclusiveStartTagKey to the key of the last tag returned and call ListTagsForDeliveryStream again.
